Articles.Content:
You can now become the first agency to send a kerbal to the Mun, and that allows you to take in more contracts and make more money. You'll have to do this before the public stops hyping about these new plans, or else you'll be limited to one SSTO to use for 40 years, and then you'll have to launch from KSC 2, without controlling it, just to dock and undock from KSS.

The only hype you're Agency gets is when you make plans to build a rocket that can't go to the Mun on it's own.
This is some nice fiction, but I don't feel it belongs here. Thread closed.
